name: Derrick K. DAVIS, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Davis v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Derrick K. DAVIS, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 14th day of May, 2009, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief and the Application for an Immediate Hearing are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
971 A.2d 1123
Derrick K. DAVIS, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent.
No. 24 EM 2009.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 14, 2009.
